doc:
Ivan Dixon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivan_Dixon 0 Ivan Nathaniel Dixon III (April 6, 1931 – March 16, 2008) was an American actor, director, and producer best known for his series role in the 1960s sitcom Hogan's Heroes, for his role in the 1967 television film The Final War of Olly Winter, and for directing many episodes of television series. Active in the civil rights movement since 1961, he served as a president of Negro Actors for Action. Ivan_Nathaniel_Dixon_III ( April_6_,_1931 – March_16_,_2008 ) was an_American_actor , director , and producer best_known for his_series_role in the_1960s_sitcom_Hogan 's_Heroes , for his_role in the_1967_television_film The_Final_War of Olly_Winter , and for directing many_episodes of television_series . Active in the_civil_rights_movement since 1961 , he served as a_president of Negro_Actors for Action .
